name: Carré Noir XTZ 3.4.2021 ( f=0.96 r=w\20 att=0.0005 b=1100 )
description: Variations on the human psyché, the Carré Noir XTZ series are generative drawings made by a custom-made random-based drawing algorithm that is both attracted by and forbidden to enter a square zone at the center, thus making it appear black. For every drawing, the algorithm runs using a certain behavioral configuration, and I stop it when I decide that its identity has emerged. Each drawing takes 5 to 30 minutes. My first NFTs… @antoine.schmitt www.antoineschmitt.com/carre-noir-xtz/
